extendedInfo.description: Let Flight Times be your guide to the latest flight information for 27 of the UKâs major airports. Track arrivals and departure times for each airport, or use the search options to search for your flight directly.Flight Times Features:â¢ Custom ordering of Airport list (Have your favourites together)â¢ Select from 27 UK airports:- Aberdeen- Belfast- Belfast City- Birmingham- Bournemouth- Bristol- Cardiff- Doncaster Sheffield- East Midlands Airport- Edinburgh- Exeter- Guernsey- Glasgow- Glasgow Prestwick- Inverness- Isle of Mann- Jersey- Leeds Bradford- Liverpool- London City- London Heathrow- London Gatwick- London Luton- London Stansted- Manchester- Newcastle- Southamptonâ¢ Arrival and Departure listings*â¢ Filter or Search for your flight, either by flight number or destination location by clicking on the search button on the main menu, or clicking on the Search icon on the top right corner of the display.*A data connection will be requiredhttp://www.brightai.net

reviews.title: Rubbish!
reviews.comment: Doesnt display properly on galaxy s3. Flight times are all wrong. It only shows flights arriving and departing between midday and 1pm.
reviews.author: Bob Dobbalina

reviews.comment: Search option would definitely help (so many flights on heathrow) apart from that love it, paid for it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Needs rework: please remember starred flights on closure, add search function and select time slot or now feature. Great potential though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Flight Times UK
reviews.comment: It quits whenever I press the step back button. Doesn\'t remember last search setting. Slow to scroll down. Go to \'time now\' needed. Search unreliable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Painfully slow and unresponsive
reviews.comment: Title says it all, Painfully slow and unresponsive. very slow on option selects, scrolling you need to pre plan. Feels as if I am trying to use this on an HTC Wildfire, not my Nexus S!
reviews.author: Andrew Scorgie

reviews.title: Doesn\'t fit the screen properly
reviews.comment: Information more accurate than another flight checker I tried, but it doesn\'t really fit the screen of my sgs2 properly. Text hangs off the edge of the screen so I can\'t read what it says. Tried looking at the settings to see if I could change this. But the settings advert only brings up an advert to buy the pro version. On the current evidence... not likely!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nightmare to use - hard to navigate starred flights arent saved kept crashing and had to start all over again if I pressed back key. Sorry one of the worst apps I\'ve ever used
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish!
reviews.comment: After looking for my flight it was showing arrivals instead of departures even on the departures list and couldn\'t find my flight anywhere. Delete!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashes my HTC Sensation on open - every time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Poor
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t display in the screen properly. It will not locate flights and it is very limited... very poor app. Disappointed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t look anything like the screenshots... A poor immitation of what was a great app on the iPhone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very poorly programmed. Fundamental flaws: Forgets started flights at random; Scrolling sluggish at best; back button exits app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app no problems as yet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.comment: Mediocre app. You get what you pay for...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Accurate, but...
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t resize to screen on nexus 4 or scroll extreme 10\" tablet...
reviews.author: John Wood

reviews.title: No good
reviews.comment: I was just testing, and a flight which has already landed was still showing as Expected until 15 minutes later. No good with this delay..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App screen
reviews.comment: It is accurate but lately the app doesnt fit right into my screen . Galaxy s3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice range of information but NO search feature. Must have this as there are 100\'s of flights coming into Heathrow every hour. Uninstalled. Shame.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not tablet-friendly
reviews.comment: This app seems to work well enough on a mobile, but its layout falls apart on a tablet\'s larger display, with the list of airports in a ridiculously narrow strip down one side of the page and the arrival/departure selectors displaced so that one is mostly off the edge of the screen and neither is legible.
reviews.author: David Carlile

reviews.title: Poor execution
reviews.comment: It doesnt fit the screen, displays a limited amount of flights, has no search, and a poor design
reviews.author: A Google User
